definition: to send/to mail/to entrust/to depend on/to attach oneself to/to live (in a house)/to lodge/foster (son etc)

to go out/to come out/to occur/to produce/to go beyond/to rise/to put forth/to happen/(used after a verb to indicate an outward direction or a positive result)/classifier for dramas, plays, operas etc

sentences.english: Please stick this stamp to the envelope before you mail the letter.
sentences.chinese: 在你寄出這封信之前，請把這張郵票貼在信封上。

sentences.english: Attach a stamp to the envelop and mail it.
sentences.chinese: 把郵票貼在信封上寄出去。

sentences.english: Send us a check today, do it now, so you will not forget.
sentences.chinese: 請於今日立即寄出支票，以免忘懷爲幸。

sentences.english: Please send your accounts for the period finishing with 31 March.
sentences.chinese: 請你寄出你截至三月底的賬目。

sentences.english: In compliance with your request, we've sent you our samples.
sentences.chinese: 應你方要求我們已經將樣品寄出。

sentences.english: That letter was posted with no stamp.
sentences.chinese: 那封信沒貼郵票就寄出去了。

sentences.english: Send us a check today. Do it now, so you won't forget.
sentences.chinese: 請於今日立即寄出支票以免忘懷爲幸。

sentences.english: Becky sent out the invitations and started preparations confidently.
sentences.chinese: 蓓基寄出請柬之後開始放心大膽地着於做準備了。

sentences.english: That letter was mailed with no stamp.
sentences.chinese: 那封信沒貼郵票就寄出去了。

sentences.english: I sent in a tape and got the job.
sentences.chinese: 我寄出了一盤磁帶，得到了這份工作。

sentences.english: On the seventh day, I had to destroy those unsent letters which might serve as evidence of my crime.
sentences.chinese: 第七天，未寄出去的信，如犯罪的證據必須銷燬。

sentences.english: Make sure the parcel's correctly tied up before you post it.
sentences.chinese: 包裹寄出之前要捆得好好的。

sentences.english: It was postmarked from some unheard-of post office in Siskiyou County, and it ran
sentences.chinese: 信是從錫斯基尤郡的一個從沒聽說過的郵局裏寄出的。

sentences.english: B: It was mailed last week.
Send a cheque made out to Trinity College.
sentences.chinese: 寄出開給三一學院的支票。

sentences.english: Could I possibly ask you to mail the letter?
sentences.chinese: 能麻煩你幫我把這封信寄出去嗎？

definition: to forward (a message, letter, article etc)
to send/to mail/to entrust/to depend on/to attach oneself to/to live (in a house)/to lodge/foster (son etc)
to sign for the acceptance of sth (e.g. a delivery etc)
